item.title: Patogh, 14 August
item.description: Tired of attending virtual events?Join us in our second IN PERSON Patogh event of the year and have fun socially interacting with others! ğŸ“This event will be held at Spanish Banks on Aug 14th. ğŸ– We will have games such as volleyball, vasati, esm-famil, pantomime and so much more. ğŸ¦ Due to covid restrictions, this event has limited spots. Only the first 30 people that fill in the link in our bio will be able to attend the event, so make sure to sign up fast!
